description: Try our easy to follow Spicy & Sweet Glazed Prawns recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Spicy & Sweet Glazed Prawns Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 60 large green prawns, peeled, deveined, tails intact

recipeInstructions.text: Combine sauces, vinegar and honey in a large bowl. Add prawns and toss to coat well. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour.
Thread 6 prawns each on 20 skewers and place on a tray. Repeat with remaining prawns and skewers.

Heat a barbecue grill or chargrill pan over medium-high heat. Cook skewers for 3-4 minutes on each side or until prawns change colour and are cooked through. Transfer to a platter. Add marinade to a saucepan, bring to the boil and cook for 2 minutes to reduce slightly. Add lemon juice. Brush prawns with some of the sauce, scatter over coriander and serve with remaining marinade and lemon wedges.
